ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: In base 18, what would the place value of the 4 be in the number 348<sub>18</sub> be?
detailedSolution: Since the 4 is the second digit, its place value is 18<sup>1</sup> times 4, or 72.
